title: More than 70 interpretations of seeing the angel of death in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What does it mean to see the Angel of Death in a dream? One of the most terrifying visions in the dreamer’s dream is seeing the Angel of Death, and the dreamer may see him in human form or come to him to take his soul or the soul of another person, as the dream dreamed. There are many forms, and we at the Egyptian website are interested in interpreting both common and rare visions, and we will present to you the strongest interpretations of this vision in the next article. Seeing the angel of death in a dream. Jurists were interested in interpreting the dream of the angel of death, and gave it many connotations, some of which are hopeful and others frightening or warning, and we will detail them. Between them for a better understanding.: Does the Angel of Death see promising signs, what are they? Or not: If the dreamer sees Azrael in his vision and he is smiling and his appearance is beautiful and does not frighten him. This beautiful appearance in which the Angel of Death appeared confirms that God pleases the seer and gives him testimony, and therefore he will be in heaven with the prophets. And the righteous saints after his death. Second: Some scholars said that if the angel of death appeared to the dreamer and he was peaceful and did not show signs of anger and violence. This indicates that the dreamer almost died from God as a result of going through severe crises, but God saves him from all this evil and lives. Life. Happy. Third: One of the jurists had another interpretation of Azrael’s vision, which is: A long life will be his division, because the angel of death has a long life, and perhaps the longest life of all these creatures that God created. Fourth: One of the jurists gave a general interpretation for all angels, including the angel of death, He said that if the dreamer saw in his dream one of these angels and he carried with him plates full of fresh fruit of different shapes and colors and gave it to them. For the fortune teller. This is an indication that he will die as a martyr. He will enjoy the bliss of heaven, its delicious food, and endless fun. Fifth: If the dreamer is married in reality and sees one of the angels telling him (God will soon give you a son), then in this vision there are two good news: The first good news: That his wife will become pregnant in the future. The relative. The second good news: This boy will be a scholar in his future life, and this confirms his intelligence and intelligence, which will distinguish him from other boys. Sixth: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is arguing with the angel of death, two, and he is able to defeat him, within this dream there are many signs, which are: This scene appears if he hits The dreamer has been ill for some time and has been struggling to recover from it. The end of the disease and the reason. God gives the dreamer great strength that will make him happy and help him achieve his dreams and aspirations in waking life. If the dreamer has a healthy body and is not suffering from an illness, and he sees this dream, then its meaning is auspicious and indicative. You saved him from a serious illness that almost broke through. His body, but God wrote to the dreamer to save him from his illness and pain. Eighth: When the dreamer sees himself kissing Azrael on the hand, head, or any part of his body, this kiss calls for inheritance. Insight will obtain him. Unpromising signs of seeing Azrael or the angel of death in a dream, learn about them: Or not: If the angel of death appears to the dreamer in his vision and gets angry with him and his clothes are frightening, and the dreamer feels in his sleep that he is afraid. The scene there is a great warning that if the dreamer continues to follow in the footsteps of Satan and satisfy his desires with evil...

title: Interpretation of a dream about soap in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about soap by Ibn Sirini: Eating soap in a dream indicates improvement in some of the problems that the dreamer is in. Buying soap in a dream indicates the money that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing soap with a fragrant smell indicates the goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing liquid soap in a dream indicates a lot Of wealth and kindness. To see yourself washing your face with soap in a dream means getting rid of worries. Soap in a dream indicates money and easy acquisition. To dream of washing with soap indicates the death of diseases and recovery. Washing your face with scented soap indicates the arrival of happy news. White soap indicates Dreaming indicates abundant nutrition. Soap in a dream for women indicates pregnancy. Eating soap is evidence of money that will come with a lot of effort and hardship. Seeing soap as a gift is an indication that you will receive something precious and valuable. Interpretation of a dream about soap for a man: For a man to see in a dream that someone is giving him soap that smells good. Good, this indicates kindness and blessing. If he sees only soap foam in the dream, this indicates the profit he will get from trade. Seeing white soap in a young man’s dream is evidence of marriage to a girl of good character. Soap in a juice dream is evidence of halal money. Soap In a man’s dream, it is evidence of success at work. Interpretation of a dream about soap for a single woman: A soap with a pleasant scent shows the happy life she lives. White soap in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her good morals. Green soap in a woman’s dream indicates marriage and the removal of worries and she will be happy with her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about soap for a woman Married Soap in a dream Married / Married indicates psychological comfort and a stable married life. Whoever sees that she is washing her face with soap will have success and happiness. Eating soap in a dream is a sign of pregnancy soon. Interpretation of a dream about soap for a pregnant womanSoap in a dream indicates the safety of the fetus and that it will be healthy. Green soap It indicates the death of pain and problems. Soap that smells good in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the birth of a beautiful child. Soap is evidence of an easy and affordable birth. What does a dream about buying soap mean? Buying soap in a dream is a sign of the purity of the dreamer’s heart and heart and may also indicate To good deeds. Buying white soap in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will get married, whether he is a man or a woman. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing yourself feeding a dead person in a dream?

preview.html: Feeding the dead in a dream There is no doubt that dreams of the dead in a dream are real and convey a clear message to the monarch or the family of the deceased, but what does it mean to dream of feeding the dead or seeing the dead asking for food from the living? Some may think that the vision does not mean good, but this vision differs in its interpretation according to the appearance of the deceased, the food he ate, and the condition of the visionary as well, so we have collected it for all of you. The interpretations given in the vision of feeding the dead according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars. What is the interpretation of feeding the dead in a dream? If this dead person is a woman and the living person eats with her in the dream, then this expresses the dreamer’s long life and his healthy life and well-being. But if the dead person is a man unknown to the fortuneteller, then this It indicates his constant travel and his distance from his family. If he knows him and is happy to feed him in the vision, this is evidence of the abundance of goodness that he enjoys in his life and his life of prosperity and happiness. Buying food in a dream and giving it to the dead person so that he can eat from it and be satisfied with it is evidence of the sustenance that is poured upon him in this time. Of his life. If the dreamer refuses to feed the dead person and takes any food from him, then his vision indicates a loss or failure in some matters in his life that clearly affect him financially. If the dreamer sees himself being offered delicious basbousa in his dream, then this vision indicates that the deceased He was a good person in his life, and he finds that many people always remember him in their prayers. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of the dream was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dreamer’s good company that does not cause him any harm, especially if this dead person was good in his life. The vision also appears A lot of goodness in the dreamer’s life, especially if he eats food with him. But if he is of bad character and the dreamer sees him in a dream eating with him, then this expresses the distress of his life and his inability to meet his needs in life. If the dreamer sees that he is taking food from the dead person and does not eat from it His vision indicates a lack of livelihood and a lack of sufficient money to support him. What is the interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi? Sheikh Al-Nabulsi explains to us that eating bread with the dead is evidence of the abundance of money in the dreamer’s life, and this makes him change his life as he wants. If this food is Meat expresses his correct religion and his insistence on correct prayer, especially if it is cooked. But if it is raw, then this interpretation is bad, as it indicates that the dreamer is exposed to the illness and fatigue that accompany it, and it could be a warning to him that his death is approaching, so he should approach that. Oh Lord, do better. Eating with him in the vision is a good sign for the pioneer that his worries and sorrows will end, so it is good news for him that he will get rid of any pain that harms him or evil that hinders his life. Eating sweets and honey with the dead person is evidence of a happy life and following a diet for the dreamer, as he will live a luxurious life without Crises and debts, and this makes his life stable and comfortable. What is the interpretation of feeding the dead in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation of feeding the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman When she sees this dream with her deceased brother, it means that she will get rid of any pain that hinders her life and makes her sad for the rest of her life

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream A person goes through different age stages in his life. The first stages of his life begin immediately after his birth and even after the age of one year around him and his abilities develop from day to day, and he can surprise his mother with how quickly he learns the new skills he learns from them, so what is the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a man This vision is considered one of the visions that indicate the good that will happen to the person who sees this dream. It also indicates the good and wonderful diet that he lives on after seeing this dream. Here are the most important interpretations related to this vision: A man gets rid of his worries and problems when he sees a child smiling at him while he is asleep. Likewise, his wife will soon become pregnant if she has no children before, and his child will be fair to him. He also gets rid of poverty and becomes rich if he sees a baby girl in his dream. After all, the single young man quickly communicates and proposes to a beautiful girl and is happy to communicate with her. Moreover, he can achieve his dreams and goals that he has sought to achieve for a long time. He also hears good and happy news when he sees a male child in a dream. He also goes through some problems that cause him sadness when he sees this child crying in a dream. Moreover, the anxiety and anxiety of the person who sees in his dream that there is a child swimming in the dream ends. See also: Interpretation of seeing my cousin in a dream and its implications Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a married woman This vision shows that this woman cares a lot about her husband and her household affairs, and it also indicates the kindness and abundance that she will live with when she sees this vision, and we will tell you the most important interpretations related to that. For this vision: A married woman is exposed to her husband's betrayal and may divorce him when she sees a long-haired child in a dream. She will also soon bear it, if the child's hair is close to the dream. She will also enjoy a large and good livelihood, and her husband will have the job he wants to get. Moreover, if this woman is not without children, she will soon travel outside her country. Moreover, this woman lives in worries and problems, she sees that this child is crying. She also succeeds in her life and lives a stable life when she sees more than one child in a dream. Also, if she sees the child sitting next to her, she will get a job in the near future. She can also achieve her goals and ambitions when she sees children's toys in a dream. See also: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream and its interpretations Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman This vision has good skin for an unmarried girl, as it is an indication of the livelihood that she will enjoy and that she will live her life with someone who loves and appreciates her, and this is derived from the interpretations related to this vision: An unmarried girl succeeds in achieving her goals and ambitions when she sees a handsome child in her dream. She also marries a man Soon, she will live with him in happiness and stability if she sees this child crawling towards her. Also, she got a promotion in her job, to a higher position than the one she was working in. Buying it indicates that she will be disturbed and will face the

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me milk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me milk in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of my husband’s dream of giving me milk in a dream that many people wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me milk in a dream. In the case of seeing the husband giving milk to his wife, the dream may indicate many good things that come to them at that time thanks to God. Seeing the husband giving me milk to his wife Giving milk to his wife in a dream may indicate the abundant food he may obtain during this period. If a woman sees that her husband is giving her milk in a dream, this may mean that she will become pregnant soon or that she will give birth to twins, thank God. Seeing a husband giving milk to his wife in a dream may It indicates the map and the huge livelihood that you will bring at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me orange juice in a dream. Seeing a husband giving his wife a cup of orange juice in a dream could indicate good skin with her short pregnancy, thank God. In the event that she sees A woman sees her husband giving her orange juice, as this may indicate happy things that will happen in her life during that period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing the husband and orange juice in a dream indicates that they will travel soon during this period, and God knows best. In the case of seeing the husband giving orange juice By his wife in a dream, this may indicate happy events that will happen to them during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my husband giving me his cell phone in a dream. If you see a husband giving his wife a phone in a dream, this may indicate the end of the financial problems they suffered from. In the previous period. Seeing the husband giving his wife a phone in a dream may indicate the stability of the family and the marital happiness that they gain during this time, and God knows best. Taking the phone from the husband in a dream may indicate a large sum of money and a large expense that he may obtain during this time. And God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed of my husband giving money to my sister in a dream. If one sees that the husband is giving money to his sister in a dream, this may indicate the stability of the family that they were enjoying at that time. When you see the husband giving money to the wife’s sister, this may indicate Good skin he may gain during this period, thanks to God. Seeing a husband giving money to his wife’s sister may indicate the marital happiness they were enjoying at that time, and God knows best. When you see a husband giving his sister money in a dream, this may indicate that he spends A very happy time in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband turning his back to me in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband is turning his back to her, this may indicate some differences between them at this time. If she sees the husband turning his back to his wife, this may indicate obstacles And problems they may face at that time. Seeing a husband turning his back on his wife in a dream may indicate a weak character and that she needs a lot of help from her husband.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving a gift to my girlfriend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of giving a gift to my friend in a dream. If you want to know the interpretation of the dream of giving a gift to my friend in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know what the meaning of the dream is and a sign of good or evil in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of the dream of giving a gift to my friend in Dream: Giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate the closeness that exists between you during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he gave a gift to his friend may indicate the good luck that the person enjoys during those days, thanks to God. Dreaming of giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate To happy events that will come to him during this period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about washing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing clothes hanging in a dream for single women, pregnant women, and divorced women, or washing clothes in dirty laundry in black and white, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Washing in a dream is one of the important dreams that we see constantly and intensely in the dream, because of constant thinking about washing clothes, whether clothes, the house, or anything else. Laundry is one of the intensive things we do in public life. To ensure personal hygiene, whether in clothes or in our home and other things that we wash, but in the event that he sees clothes in the dream, the dreamer begins to think about the reason for the vision, and that it brings good or bad things and many things that are going on in the dreamer’s mind, which we will explain correctly. Interpretation Washing in a dreamWashing in a dream shows goodness, improving things, changing circumstances, and relief from worries. The published interpretation of the dream of washing shows goodness, getting rid of problems, moving to a new stage, alleviating worries. The interpretation of seeing washing in the laundry indicates changing circumstances, and arranging things. Going to a scene brings news and relief from it, and seeing washing indicates that the white color indicates goodness, good things, changing circumstances, resolving disputes at home, and the dream interpretation of dirty laundry shows fatigue, worries, and the complexity of the matter. Facilitating matters, stabilizing and lightening things, and the interpretation of a dream about washing and anointing shows kindness, relief from fatigue, changing conditions for the better, and alleviating their worries. Interpretation of washing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing clothes in a dream is evidence of many problems that will befall him in public life and that he will commit many sins and stay away from The Islamic religion, while he washes and dries clothes in a coordinated manner in a dream indicates that he is. She is a strong person and a very strong personality, as she works to solve all his problems on her own without interference from anyone. Seeing the dreamer buying clothes and returning home in a dream, washing them at home and putting them completely in his home, is evidence that the dreamer will receive abundant livelihood in the near future and will gain goodness and be free. From everyone. Problems and sorrows that exist in general life. Washing new clothes in a dream is evidence that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better in the near future and he will recover soon. The dreamer saw that his wife was washing all the dirty clothes in the dream and helped her complete the washing process in the dream. Evidence of the great state of mutual love between them in public life, and it indicates the extent of their interconnectedness and the lack of separation or the emergence of difficult problems, and they will be able to overcome all problems. If the dreamer is cleaning clothes in cooperation with one of his female friends at work, this is evidence that the dreamer will enjoy satisfaction He is great at work and will also achieve good results in his work and money. Seeing dirty clothes in a dream, then the dreamer washes them completely until they come back new without stains or dirt in the dream, is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety and lack of livelihood in his life, but he will succeed in overcoming all problems. .

title: Interpretation of seeing garlic cloves in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing garlic cloves: Garlic is considered a spicy plant and gives food a scent and a good taste. It has many benefits for the body and treats many diseases. It is used in therapeutic and prophetic medicine. Seeing it in a dream means backbiting and gossip, and it may indicate a lot of money or marriage for a young man and a girl, and we will explain that in detail in this article. Garlic cloves in a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man, a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, provide interpretations by great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and the Imam. Sadiq or contemporary interpreters, follow us on the Roya website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing garlic cloves in a dream? Seeing yourself buying garlic in a dream means a lot of money without any fatigue or effort. Seeing cutting garlic It indicates the transmission of puns and gossip. Seeing yourself giving garlic For someone, it indicates friendship and love between them, or friendship and mutual friendship. Seeing garlic in a dream indicates the marriage of an unmarried young man and the marriage of an unmarried girl. Seeing cooked garlic announces repentance for sins and sins. Seeing eating raw garlic in a man’s dream indicates illegal profit and access to money whose source is prohibited. Seeing a sick person eating raw garlic in a dream indicates recovery from illness. What is the interpretation of a dream about garlic for a married woman? Seeing a married woman cooking garlic portends a lot of money and a lot of goodness for her and her family. Seeing garlic for a married woman indicates hostility and strife with neighbors or family problems. Watching a married woman cutting garlic indicates marital problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about garlic for a single woman? If a girl sees that she is buying garlic from the market, this indicates success, success, and achieving what she wants. If a girl sees that she is eating cloves of garlic, it seems that she has heard good news. What is the interpretation? Dreaming of planting garlic in a dream for a married woman? Seeing planting garlic for a married woman means the abundance of good and plentiful money in her life. Seeing a field of garlic in a dream for a married woman indicates the abundance of childbearing. What is the interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream? Seeing planting garlic for a single girl indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing planting Garlic in a young man’s dream. Signing marriage with a good girl. Seeing garlic in a pregnant woman’s dream means facilitating childbirth and the birth of a male. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating garlic for a single woman? Seeing eating garlic cloves for a single woman. D remembers that she heard good news and it may indicate that she will soon marry someone she loves. Seeing eating Garlic in a girl’s dream, which indicates the end of hostility and quarrels with whoever may be her fiancé, marriage to him, and the beginning of a happy life with him. What is the interpretation of a dream about planting onions and garlic? Watch the planting of onions and garlic. It portends a lot of money and kindness to the monarch. Seeing garlic being uprooted from the field can indicate feelings of sadness. It can indicate the death of a loved one. What is the interpretation of eating garlic in a dream? Seeing garlic being removed by someone indicates wealth and riches, as it shows love and friendship with that person. Seeing yourself giving garlic in a dream shows love and friendliness with
